document_data.caption: A map showing Krabbellor Silversmiths (labeled #11) on Snake Alley.
document_data.name: Krabbellor Silversmiths
document_data.mainbody: '''Krabbellor Silversmiths''' was a business located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: Krabbellor Silversmiths was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] within the [[Waterdeep/Adventurers' Quarter|Adventurers' Quarter]]. The front of the building faced [[Snake Alley]], while the rear of the building faced the intersection of [[Grocer's Lane]] and [[Weeping Maiden's Run]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Adventurers' Quarter}}
